... "support the government that accepts the IMF monitoring that comes with the requirement to raise the retirement age of women to 65 ..."
"It is not the same to negotiate the removal of real debt as to facilitate the happy indebtedness of several generations of Argentines ..."
"It is not the same to try to adapt to the monopoly Clarín that to vote the decrees to Macri that scrapped the Media Law ..."
"It is not the same to generate work as to destroy it, it is not the same to support withholdings than to remove them ..."

"It reflects the manipulated surveys x the area of ​​marketing of Cambiemos, to which newspapers, radios and official channels give plausibility ..."

"There's a vacancy, betrayed representation, and maybe 2017 puts things back in order, again." https://t.co/5i5lwi1Viw
"Next year, in the legislative elections, the level of political awareness of Argentine society will be played" https://t.co/5i5lwi1Viw
"... almost two years of application of neoliberal policies, it will also be the opportunity to correct the anomaly of representation ..."
